## parseQuery() function

Transforms a queryString into a [LocationQuery](./vue-router.locationquery.md) object. Accept both, a version with the leading `?` and without Should work as URLSearchParams

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseQuery(search: string): LocationQuery
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                | Description            |
| --------- | ------------------- | ---------------------- |
| search    | <code>string</code> | search string to parse |

<b>Returns:</b>

`LocationQuery`

a query object
